channel.title: The Instance: World of Warcraft Podcast!
channel.description: The Instance: Weekly radio for fans and lovers of World of Warcraft. We don't take sides, we don't whine, we just give you the facts, news and tips that you want and need for your favorite online addiction. Come meet us at the stone for another Instance!

item.title: 354 - The Instance: Boosting Early
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, picking that boost character, rusty high dps, pre-pay for WOD and get early rewards, Greg Street is a real Riot at parties, HS balance patch is here, is grinding fun, why you left the community, new talents in retro, Silvermoon is doomed, WoW cards in HS, blizzard says NO to keys, boosting ideas, Paula Patton center stage, and more!

item.title: 353 - The Instance: Crazy Chen
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, why would anyone create a fresh alt before WoD, smart players avoid Trojans, Blizzard wants to call you back, chinese WoW crime group gets some hard time, weapon skills have overstayed their welcome, where's the WoW / HS integration, getting a fresh start in today's PVP, subclasses in the game, Diablo themed Hearthstone, and more!

item.title: 352 - The Instance: Make us Hard Trash
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, the reaping comes in March, some cool new cast members join the WoW movie, our big end of year live call-in show, and more!

item.title: 351 - The Instance: Spys Like Us
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, SoO has bad trash, you may have been rolling in a dungeon with a TSA agent, get your shopping down now in the game, get your pet back fast, HS gets a big patch, why some can't get through that damned portal yet, why no new classes, Garrisons as Zones, too many mages, HS stuff for the holidays, and more!

item.title: 350 - The Instance: The Legend of NethroSunder
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, Raiding Prideful Shas, wow devs are clearly Zelda fans, we have a cast for the movie and there are some surprises in there, we get down deep into the whole GregGate, group finder in 6.0 makes sense, mail stuff to people no matter what realm they're on, supporting alts, more classes want Green Fire, your calls, funny Garrosh movies, and more!

item.title: 349 - The Instance: The Reaping
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, we celebrate 9 years of WoW, lots of little stuff that happened over the week, the undead female is looking...interested, Karazhan is getting the clean treatment, more on why you can't fly till 6.1, how often we might expect an item squish, calls emails and more!

item.title: 348 - The Instance: Pre-flight
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, let's get this flying business out of the way, clarification and details on Mythic raiding, recruiting friends got better, feeling renewed about blizzard games, no free customization, how are those human females coming along, declining numbers and the future, why people cancel in the first place, the absense of Agrra and more!

item.title: 347 - The Instance: Warlords of Blizzcon
item.description: Our Blizzcon edition of the show, featuring a big crowd, all three of us, and the likes of Greg Street and Russell Brower! We take on everything we heard at the event and more, live, from Blizzcon 2013!

item.title: 346 - The Instance: There is no LFD
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, if you Blink you might miss it, the things we look forward to most at Blizzcon next week, some nice additions in 5.4.1, Scott might be right about the movie plot after all, letting players say what is unfun, are we still storming castles, merged servers are still a thing, the robot just got some great new stuff to ask it, and more!

item.title: 345 - The Instance: That crocolisk had a family
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, Flex Feedback is interesting, more realms are merging, Cata is now part of the official family, noodle cart chefs rejoice, we play a little WoW trivia on the air, Greg is very happy about challenge modes, why can't hunters see their quivers, what about those old dungeons and how hard they were, the future of Jaina Proudmore, calling Scott out on Boosted XP, save money on mounts and more!

item.title: 344 - The Instance: Tame a Rooster
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, Blizzard is taking Hearthstone to the stage at Blizzcon, Find your friends at the meeting stone in Anaheim, the results of a nice big dev round table, SOO raid schedule continues to evolve, more connected realms, on the idea of letting you trade your Flex gear around, how Flex is doing generally, how we tell what's what in a busy raid, you CAN play HS and WoW at the same time, Beiber loves WoW, and more!

item.title: 340 - The Instance: Gerp the Paid For
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, Hearthstone still a threat, The Instance gets all visual and stuff, Dills is still dominating, and can report on how the Arena treated him, the SoO raid schedule is in our hands, Greg weighs in on flex raiding, admitting when your voice tech sucked, LFR and the loss of epic experience, the problem with buying pre-made characters, what if the horde were ran by a council, you tell us what Race is under appreciated, Ambitious Mod time, we give away a WoW fun pack, and more!

item.title: 339 - The Instance: Going Deep
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, Hearthstone continues to be pretty awesome, Reaper of Souls seems alright to us, the WoW TCG is coming to an end, a word on Connected Realms and Faction Balance, some insight from blizzard on how things are going on the backend, the EU need not wait much longer for their Hearthstone beta access, World of Tweets, What if the Horde moved to a new city, new lore in a new expansion, why we don't use Vent to podcast, WoW Challenger challenges challenge modes, and more!

item.title: 338 - The Instance: Got to know when to fold em.
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, we have TWO great interviews on the show, first with Chris Metzen, Doug Gregory, and Laurel Austin about the fantastic Burdens of Shaohao video series, then Turpster sits down with Tom Chilton and Cory Stockon in Germany's GamesCom for a nice talk about the state and future of WoW, and then Dills and Scott load up on the Hearthstone impressions in the first week of beta. We smatter in your calls and questions as well, making this one of the most epic shows we've done! Enjoy!

item.title: 337 - The Instance: Hellscream needs to go
item.description: On this episode of The Instance, 5.4 hits with a trailer like none before it, BattleNet 1.0 is in the hands of the people and we have some thoughts, Reaper of Souls and The Dark Below are names to remember, the deal struck between Vyrian and Jaina, when you out-level a zone, guild leaders have a new training tool, DOTA 2 and Blizzard missing the boat, you will be happy to be Burdened, we give away a comic book collection, and loads more!

item.description: Welcome to our 300th episode! We celebrate by doing a show about WoW! Seems only fitting. :) We talk about everything 5.1 brings to the table, Brawlers Guild invites, item upgrades, new factions and quest lines, state of the show and the game, loads of phone calls, Happy 8 Year Birthday to wow, and more!
